data.name: J-Jump Arena
data.detailed_description:
Play my other games today!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1290260/Dark_Roll_Free_Kick_Challenge/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/962810/Dark_Roll/


About the Game

A turn based, jumping elimination game where everything happens all at once!
Predict your opponents' moves and plan your own wisely!
Game which is easy to learn, but hard to master.



J-Jump arena is a turn-based game with variety of modes for both single player and multiplayer. Plan your moves wisely, as when the turn is up - everything happens all at once! Take part in a deadly Battle Royale with a broad arsenal of weapons, a peaceful golf-like Race, or a gem-collecting Treasure Hunt competition! Learn to be precise with your jumps and weapon handling, as well as in the art of outsmarting your opponents!

FEATURES

  • Simple to understand gameplay mechanics
  • Multiplayer for up to 10 players
  • Single player challenges
  • Various modes
  • Customizable character
  • Unlockable items
  • Steam achievements

data.short_description: A turn based, jumping elimination game where everything happens all at once! Learn to be precise with your jumps and weapon handling, as well as in the art of outsmarting your opponents! Multiplayer for up 10 players and single player challenges available.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
